name: Meta-Agent (.NET)
description: Pre-defined meta-agent profile optimized for .NET 10.0 projects. Provides scaffold, policy validation and guidance for LLM-driven orchestration.

commands.description: Scaffold a project template and create a default policy if missing.

commands.description: Validate a repository policy JSON against the meta-agent schema.

commands.name: agent
commands.description: List or describe pre-defined agent manifests available to the system.
